item.title: Create 3D particle and disintegration effects for music video - Upwork
item.description:
Seeking someone who is really good with 3D particle effects for around 4 scenes (could be less but certainly not more) in a music video where the particles should resemble small rocks/stones emanating from a character in the video. In the final scene the character disintegrates into particles while lying on the ground.

Each scene is short, ranging from less than one second to 4 seconds for the longest one. Am providing video files, stills and visual references to help clarify the job style and scope.



Budget: $200
Posted On: June 20, 2021 11:31 UTC
Category: 3D Animation
Skills:Houdini, Blender, VFX Animation
Country: Malaysia
click to apply

item.title: Seeking an UI Design to for a Web app - Upwork
item.description:
Discovering what Features and Functionalities of Artist App from an idea. I need your assistance and we will work together as a team:

1.  Understand My Features and Functionalities for all users of the whole application
(You should be able to provide new features for the app based on past experience with the industries. Note the only parts of my feature list should be omitted due to your constructive criticism)
2. Create mid to hi fi wireframes/UI Designs of the whole application in categories and
3.  Brainstorm and Conduct app/market research to create detail descriptions for each UI design in regards to their flow, inputs, features and functionality for each ui design page.
4.  Prototype user flow journey for creatives and business users.

Need to have an understanding event planning & producer, Event & product plan, project planning, budgeting, Resume/interviewing, crowdfunding, the arts, and etc industries.

Project is 3 to 4 months, and this is fixed based project.
We need to create 3 to 4  milestones.

The above are some product development tasks for creating a Collaboration Application from the ideation phase to identifying the product phase to research phase to the wire frame or design phase. Main objective of this project is to create the flow of the App idea, so I can estimate the cost of the app. The bigger the matter but  not feature left behind.

Budget: $5
Posted On: June 20, 2021 11:31 UTC
Category: UX/UI Design
Skills:Wireframes, Prototype, Mockup, Sketches, User Flows, User Research, Usability Testing, Competitive Analysis, Adobe XD, Adobe Photoshop, Sketch, InVision, Visual Communication, UX Writing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Calculator for quoting , basically a spreadsheet online - Upwork
item.description:
We have a spreadsheet that we use with formulas to work out the cost to screen print say 50 short sleeve  t shirts , 20 long sleeve t shirts, 10 hoodies

we need a simple form that our office can use for quoting
enter number of shirts
enter number of printing locations, front, back, left hand sleevem right hand sleeve
number of colors of ink
and out comes a price


i will need someone who can create all this on line
i will provide a domain name, bit for this first stage expect you to host for product development

i can email you the spread sheet with explanations if interested , will require your email address

Budget: $100
Posted On: June 20, 2021 11:31 UTC
Category: Full Stack Development
Country: Australia

item.title: Basic scrapper with API and auto submission - Upwork
item.description:
Hi.
We're looking to create an automatic blogs system for current platform.

We would need to:
Get site's feed on a web panel and API
Submit picks through web panel and/or API


We would need an admin panel to view scrapped data and send 'picks' to the site.

In this case, we would need to have a robot that constantly feeds us the pricing for each event and possibility, and be able to execute when we instruct.

I'm looking for someone who already has experience win the betting industry, forums, blogs and football basic knowledge.

Thanks.

Budget: $500
Posted On: June 20, 2021 11:30 UTC
Category: Scripting & Automation
Skills:API Integration, Automation, Very Small (1-9 employees)
Country: Israel
click to apply

item.title: Euro qualifying score prediction - Upwork
item.description:
Italy will look to improve on its 29-match unbeaten streak when it battles Wales in a UEFA Euro 2020 Group A matchup on Sunday. Italy (2-0-0) has dominated thus far at Euro 2020, posting 3-0 wins over Turkey and Switzerland. Wales (1-0-1) tied Switzerland 1-1 to open play and then defeated Turkey 2-0 on Wednesday.

Kickoff is set for noon ET at Stadio Olimpico in Rome. Italy is listed as the -200 (risk $200 to win $100) favorite on the money line, while Wales is +700 and a draw would return +280 in the latest Italy vs. Wales odds at William Hill Sportsbook. The over-under for total goals scored is 2.5 in the Wales vs. Italy odds. Before making any Italy vs. Wales picks, check out the UEFA Euro 2020 predictions and best bets from SportsLine's Martin Green.

After working in the sports betting industry for several years, Green became a professional sports writer and handicapper and has covered the game worldwide. Since then, his European soccer picks have been spot-on. Green has generated nearly $19,000 for $100 bettors since the 2017-18 season. He's having a great Euro 2020 as well, with his picks generating over $500 in profit for $100 bettors through Friday's action. Green has his finger on the pulse of the game all over the globe.

Now, Green has set his sights on Italy vs Wales and he recently revealed his best bets for the 2020 Euro matchup. You can only see them on SportsLine. Here are the betting lines and trends for Wales vs Italy:



Hourly Range: $15.00-$35.00
Posted On: June 20, 2021 11:30 UTC
Category: Machine Learning
Skills:Data Analysis
Country: Indonesia
click to apply

item.title: Find Addresses for 100 People - Upwork
item.description:
I have a spreadsheet of 100 people. I need somebody to find addresses with matching zip codes for these 100 people. You will only be paid for those you find with matching zip codes. If you cannot find an address with a matching zip code, please highlight that row in red. The addresses must be placed as a single line in the "Address" column of the spreadsheet (there are already columns for city, state, and zip code).

Please only apply if you can finish this job in the next 3 hours.

Tell me your bid per address found.

Budget: $6
Posted On: June 20, 2021 11:30 UTC
Category: Data Entry
Skills:Clerical Procedures, Data Entry
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Front-End Developer (React.js) - Upwork
item.description:
Note: This is a long-term full-time role.

We are looking for an experienced react developer to help us improve the website building experience for our users.

As a React Developer, You’ll
--  Improve website building experience for our users
--  Build new features and extend existing features of our application
--  Ensure accessibility, usability, and performance of our application
--  Follow Test-Driven Development (TDD)
--  Follow a defined style guide such as Airbnb or Google
--  Collaborate with the design & development team to improve the user experience

Requirements & Skills
--  3+ years of working experience with React ecosystem
--  Strong understanding of JavaScript (EcmaScript)
--  Strong understanding of HTML5/CSS3 (SCSS)
--  Knowing React Hooks, React Router, Redux is a must
--  Knowing React DnD, Context API, and Webpack/Babel is a huge plus
--  Have worked with Server-Side Rendering (SSR) with Next.js
--  Willing to consume GraphQL APIs
--  Have experience in writing tests using Jest, React testing library, and Cypress
--  Experience in TypeScript, CI/CD & AWS ecosystem is a plus
--  Use React Profiler & Chrome DevTool extensively to ensure application performance
--  Ability to write tests for every single functionality added by you

Hourly Range: $10.00-$45.00
Posted On: June 20, 2021 11:28 UTC
Category: Front-End Development
Skills:Web Application, React, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, GraphQL
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Angular6 with Java full stack developer(Indian only) - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for multiple full stack freelancers who have very strong knowledge on Java, spring, hibernate, Angular

Any cloud like aws, azure, gcp if you are good with, that is also plus.

We have multiple requirements on full stack.  Another open requirement is Java, spring hibernate with React.js We can align as per your tech skill set.

Please read below points before applying:

1) Remote only (Zoom, WEb ex, gototmeeting or any similar software). You must be having a good internet connection.

2) Indian preferred. (Srilankan or Bangladeshi person also can apply.)

3) Timings: At least 2 hours per day on weekdays.

4)  It will be good If you will be able to show me some of your work. Anything like GitHub repositories will work.

5) If you are just a college pass out, please do not reply.

If you are an expert in any other technology and looking for freelancing work, We are looking for freelancers on multiple technologies and have multiple freelancing positions.(For Job support, online trainings, proxy, coding assessment help, Small Tasks support).

If you or any of your friend is interested in any kind of freelance work in any of the technology and you are expert in your skill set.  Please ping me with your skill set.
Freshers are not allowed.

Below are few technologies, which we are hiring for.

1) React.js with jsx and typescript
2) angularjs and angular 2+
3) Java full stack with microservices and UI
4) Dot net with core
5) Azure Devops and azure powerapps
6) Tableau
7) data science
8) Python with django
9) Android with flutter
10) Salesforce
11) Mulesoft
12) Qa Automation with selenium
13) Big data Hadoop
14) Data enginner
15) Vue.js
16) Sql, SSIS
17) IOS with flutter
18) Node.js
19) RPA with uipath and blueprism
20) Informatica

and Many more technologies..
Pay: No limit to earn for good candidates.

Budget: $280
Posted On: June 20, 2021 11:27 UTC
Category: Full Stack Development
Skills:Java, JavaScript, API, Spring Framework, RESTful, Angular 6
Country: India
click to apply

item.title: Developer needed to create a monitor to checks when product goes instock - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a developer to code monitors for us for different sites.

The monitor should be able to:

Check when product goes instock and then send a notification to a Discord channel. At the end a notification when the product is sold out (example webhook: https://prnt.sc/16279ot). The reason we do this is to let users see when product is in stock and check out as fast as possible, because the product sells out fast.

We would make this a long term project, because we want to add more sites (depending on the need) and if the sites make changes, that the errors are then fixed.

Some pages have a bot-protection. Sooner or later you have to know how to bypass them.

Programming language should be: NodeJS

If you think you are made for the job, please let me know and we can arrange a test project.

Budget: $200
Posted On: June 20, 2021 11:25 UTC
Category: Mobile App Development
Skills:JavaScript
Country: Germany
click to apply

The reason we do this is to let users see when product is in stock and check out as fast as possible, because the product sells out fast.

We would make this a long term project, because we want to add more sites (depending on the need) and if the sites make changes, that the errors are then fixed.

item.title: Looking for strong tech recruiters to support with recruitment across Europe and Middle East - Upwork
item.description:
We are a specialised tech recruitment business based out Dubai with a strong client base and looking for seasoned tech recruiters to support with project delivery across Middle East and European markets.

The ideal candidate should have a proven track record and strong expertise in souring tech talent across the markets globally, with a focus on Central and Eastern Europe.

You have to have a strong background in recruiting for the following:

Software Development
Data Science and AI
Cloud Computing
Cyber Security

We are not particular about the years of experience in recruitment, but rather on your success rate, strong technical knowledge and understanding of the market.



Hourly Range: $15.00-$44.00
Posted On: June 20, 2021 11:24 UTC
Category: Recruiting
Skills:Technology, Recruiting, Candidate Sourcing
Country: United Arab Emirates
click to apply
